noteUpdateError: An error occurred while updating the note
noteCreationError: An error occurred while creating the note
folderEmptyDescription: The folder "{layoutTitle}" doesn't have any notes yet. Create the first note to get started.
graphEmptyDescription: The folder "{layoutTitle}" doesn't have any notes yet. Create the first note to start visualizing connections between them
deleteNoteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the note "{{title}}"?
editorHelp_enter: Press Enter in a list to automatically continue the marker.
editorHelp_preview: The right pane shows the rendered preview.
unsavedConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to leave?
unsavedConfirmDescription: This note has unsaved changes. If you leave now, your changes will be lost.
paragraphsDescription: To divide text into paragraphs, leave an empty line between them.
paragraphsExample:
First paragraph

Second paragraph
Continuation of second paragraph
lineBreaksDescription:
For line breaks within a paragraph, use two spaces at the end of the line, a backslash, or the
tag.
headingsExample:
# Heading H1
## Heading H2
### Heading H3
listsExample:
1. Ordered list
2. Second item

- Unordered list
* Different marker
+ Third variant

- [x] Completed item
- [ ] Incomplete item
codeLanguageSupport: All popular programming languages are supported: javascript, python, java, css, html, and others.
tablesExample:
| Header 1 | Header 2 |
|----------|----------|
| Cell 1   | Cell 2   |
| Cell 3   | Cell 4   |
quotesAndDividersExample:
> This is a quote
> Second line of quote

---
***
escapingDescription: To display special characters, use a backslash:
escapingExample:
\*Asterisk without formatting\*
\# Not a heading
\\ Backslash
importDropOrClick: Drop a markdown file here or click to select
importWarning: Note: Imported content will replace existing note data
connectionFailedReload: Unable to restore connection. Try reloading the page.
